body: Good god, I've done part time job as tutor, and I absolutely feel it. Like bitch you want me to make your middle school son fucking Williams Wordsworth for $30?! Don't know about the rape tho

But the forceful act is the point of this doujin. He can't simply confess to some woman who he's only had sex with while drunk, it's not like he had romantic feelings towards her, he just found a weakness to exploit and uses her to fulfill his sexual urges.
Idk why, this one reminds me of that game, Saeko-san, hahaha XD
He should just confess to her or something. I'm sure she'd accept him. He shouldnt be acting like pill Cosby or something
